Mission and Purpose

The DBT Foundation is active in the areas of public challenges, technology, knowledge, values and action. DBT aims to create platforms for combining participants knowledge in the search of sustainable solutions across different issues and subjects.

History

The DBT Foundation has more than 25 years of experience with facilitating dialogue and engagement processes locally, regionally and globally.

Specializations and activities

The DBT Foundation is specialized in interactive methodologies, involving trans-disciplinary research, stakeholder involvement, citizen participation, political debates and advice, and public communication.

Major projects and events

World Wide Views on global warming (2009)

World Wide Views on Biodiversity (2012)

Funding

The DBT Foundation receives funding for projects from a variety of national and international sources.
